channel.title: How do I change my character rights on a testscape source?
channel.description: Im having trouble changing the rights of my character. I changed the rights to 3 from 0 and when i logged back in typed "test" and there was no gold crown beside my name. Can anyone help me out and please don't spam this topic.

Omfg… you DON’T create character files, the server creates them automatically when a new character has been made.

item.title: How do I change my character rights on a testscape source?
item.dc:creator: @zauruke zauruke
item.description:
@zauruke wrote:

go to characters.
right click, go to new, then create a textpad.
make the textpad your name.

copy and past code.

[ACCOUNT]
character-username = (screenname)
character-password = (password)

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3210
character-posy = 3425
character-rights = 3
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = 5.111.102.23
character-lastlogin = 20070211
character-energy = 32
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 2100

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 1050 1
character-equip = 1 -1 0
character-equip = 2 -1 0
character-equip = 3 4151 1
character-equip = 4 4720 1
character-equip = 5 1199 1
character-equip = 6 0 0
character-equip = 7 4722 1
character-equip = 8 0 0
character-equip = 9 -1 0
character-equip = 10 -1 0
character-equip = 11 0 0
character-equip = 12 -1 0
character-equip = 13 -1 0

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0
character-look = 1 7
character-look = 2 8
character-look = 3 9
character-look = 4 5
character-look = 5 0

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 71 854600

[ITEMS]

[BANK]

item.source: How do I change my character rights on a testscape source?

item.title: How do I change my character rights on a testscape source?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

In client.java search for //start of moderator. There should be something like this //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(" Nvi Ible")) { playerRights = 3; } Just change the Nvi Ible to your name, save & compile.

Read full topic
